solution_line_template: Laura can paint {ken_paint_rate} tiles/minute x {laura_multiplier_ken} = <<{ken_paint_rate}*{laura_multiplier_ken}={laura_paint_rate}>>{laura_paint_rate} tiles/minute.
Kim can paint {laura_paint_rate} tiles/minute - {kim_fewer_than_laura} tiles/minute = <<{laura_paint_rate}-{kim_fewer_than_laura}={kim_paint_rate}>>{kim_paint_rate} tiles/minute.
All 4 can paint {don_paint_rate} tiles/minute + {ken_paint_rate} tiles/minute + {laura_paint_rate} tiles/minute + {kim_paint_rate} tiles/minute = {total_paint_rate_per_minute} tiles/minute.

In {total_minutes} minutes, they can paint {total_minutes} minutes x {total_paint_rate_per_minute} tiles/minute = <<{total_minutes}*{total_paint_rate_per_minute}={total_tiles_painted}>>{total_tiles_painted} tiles.
